data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: It is easy to recognize life. Cats, ____ in ____ gardens, ____, etc., are ____ alive. Computers, ____ air ____ breathe, ____, etc., are ____ alive. But ____ is ____? What makes living beings different from sand or water?
data.partBlankContent: It is easy to recognize life. Cats, tr___ in o__ gardens, ours_____, etc., are a__ alive. Computers, t__ air w_ breathe, water_____, etc., are n__ alive. But wh__ is li__? What makes living beings different from sand or water?
data.answer: 认识生命很容易。猫、橡树园中的树、我们自己等等，都是活的。电脑、我们呼吸的空气、瀑布等等，都是没有生命的。但生命是什么?是什么使生物不同于沙或水?
